name: Purple Means Go
description:
JamDna13 Submission.

A game about leading a group of survivors out of a war torn country. You must guide them past the guard using your purple flashlight.

Controls:

Left click to shine your flashlight. Only one survivor will make a run for it at a time.

Criteria:

Stealth - Player must direct the group of survivors to sneak past a surviving guard.

Jump - Survivors must jump to climb over the fence.

Purple - Purple is the main mechanic in the game, being the color of the flashlight that signals to the survivors that it's safe to go.

Wham! Sounds - When a survivor is caught, the guard will fight them with a kapow sound.

All art is drawn by me. Music is composed by another team member. The kapow sound was taken from Mike Koenig  at http://soundbible.com/1003-Ta-Da.html. The font was found  at https://www.1001fonts.com/6809-chargen-font.html.
